p: The FLI was normal (<30) in 273 subjects (39.2%), intermediate (between ≥30 and <60) in 160 subjects (23.0%), and indicative of fatty liver (≥60) in 264 subjects (37.9%). The subgroup of patients with T2DM ( n = 38) had a significantly higher FLI than subjects without T2DM (78.36 ± 16.97 vs. 44.92 ± 31.57, p < 0.001).
